member.name: NMCHAR
member.summary: Contains information used with character notification messages.

member.name: NMCHAR.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information about this notification.

member.name: NMCHAR.ch
member.summary: The character that is being processed.

member.name: NMCHAR.dwItemPrev
member.summary: A 32-bit value that is determined by the control that is sending the notification.

member.name: NMCHAR.dwItemNext
member.summary: A 32-bit value that is determined by the control that is sending the notification.
